resources.string: Why is the spider the most needy animal in the world?\nBecause it is an aracneedyou.
Why does not the pine tree get lost in the forest?\nBecause it has a pinecone.
What did a pagodeiro do in church?\nHe went to sing PÁ GOD.
Why was Napoleon always invited to parties?\nBecause he was GOOD AT PARTY.
What is the king of cheeses?\nIt is requeijão.
Why does not the old lady wear a watch?\nBecause she is a lady.
When did Americans eat meat for the first time?\nWhen Cristovão Com Lombo arrived.
